Name: Create Shared Mailbox
Description: Create a shared mailbox and add users - Mailbox name, mailbox alias, email id, users to be added, permissions for full access, send as, and Calendar Access. Ask for the details from the user

Name: Change Name of a Shared Mailbox
Description: Modify shared mailbox settings by sharing the required details

Name: Change Email Address of a Shared Mailbox
Description: Modify shared mailbox settings by sharing the required details

Name: Add members to Shared Mailbox
Description: Add new members to existing mailbox by providing details

Name: Remove members from Shared Mailbox
Description: Remove members from existing mailbox by providing detials

Name: Remove Shared Mailbox
Description: Delete shared mailbox settings by sharing the required details

Name: Set MailBox Quota
Description: Configure Storage Quota for Exchange Online mailbox as per User requirements or Organizational Policies

Name: Create Distribution List
Description: A Distribution Group, or A distribution List, is a collection of two or more people that appear on your Organizational address book

Name: Modify Distribution List
Description: A Distribution Group, or A distribution List, is a collection of two or more people that appear on your Organizational address book

Name: Remove Distribution List
Description: Remove or delete a distribution list

Name: Manage Mailbox Permission
Description: Grant/Revoke user permissions to a user to a designated mailbox

Name: Mailbox Deletion
Description: Grant/Revoke user permissions to a user to Delete a mailbox

Name: Enable Online Archive
Description: Raise a request to enable online Archive for your mailbox by providing the identity details

Name: Enable Litigation Hold
Description: Place a mailbox on Litigation hold to retain all mailbox content, including deleted items and the original versions of modified items

Name: Disable Litigation Hold
Description: Remove Litigation Hold on a mailbox

Name: Enable Email Forwarding
Description: Email forwarding lets you forward email messages sent to a your mailbox to another mailbox inside or outside of your organization.
